Hello Everybody, mhogar Here!

Join me as we create fun and interesting projects, games, and animations.

YouTube GitHub

Ryan "mhogar" Stamp

Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Computing, I have a passion for programming and expressing myself creatively. I'll hope you'll join me on my quest to make the world a better place, one line of code at a time.

Projects Games Animations
Byte Sized
Byte Sized is an ongoing YouTube series where we create bite-sized applications to demonstrate some of the more interesting concepts in the field of programming.
Winter 2021 - Present
The Creeper Whisperer
The Creeper Whisperer is a Minecraft animation of a segment from the 3rd life youtube series. In this animation, Grian lures a creeper into the group causing Scar's first death.
Spring 2021
Cube Robots... in Space!!!
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, this is a simple puzzle game where you play as an adorable cube robot trying to destroy all platforms in the level. It placed in the top 16% of near 6000 entries.
Summer 2021
Slime Farm
Slime Farm is an evolution simulator. Completed as a university individual course of study, this application is an intuitive and user-friendly approach to genetic algorithms.
Fall 2020
Migration Runner
Migration Runner is a Go library for managing and running database migrations. It is maintained by a continuous integration pipeline and boasts 100% test coverage.
Summer 2020
Student's Toolshed
Created using ruby-on-rails, Student's Toolshed is a collection of self-contained javascript applications. The apps themselves are small, useful tools targeted for use by university students.
Winter 2019
Study Pres Generator
Study Pres Generator is a simple command-line ruby application for creating flashcard study presentations. It takes a JSON file of questions and answers as input and uses LaTeX to create the presentation.
Fall 2019
Course Scheduler
Course Scheduler is an application that generates all possible schedules given the timeslots for each course. It may look and feel like legacy software, but it gets the job done.
Spring 2018
